name: 2023 5th International Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Education
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by the conference committees and international reviewers. Accepted papers of WAIE 2023 after proper registration and presentation will be published into Conference Publishing Services (CPS), and submitted to IEEE Xploreâ„¢ for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus Index, and other indexing services.
